text: Should I learn Ruby or Python?
I'm a C(++)/C# programmer and I would like to learn a scripting language to create small tools (text processing, build scripts, a little web development, etc).
I would like to learn either Ruby or Python.
Is there a good reason to chose one over the other?
I looked at some sample code in both languages and they seem very similar to me.
I also found the following comparisons:
What are the biggest differences between Python and Ruby from a philsophical perspective
Why learn Perl, Python, Ruby if the company is using C++, C# or Java as the application language?
